about_the_game:
Private Dick: Lipstick & Lies is an opulent, hard-boiled visual novel set in a seedy modern world of deception, betrayal, scheming and lashings of joyful depravity.

P.D. Sam Steele is in a rut. His clients have dried up, his useless secretary is demanding her paycheck, and his ex-girlfriend has broken the sanctity of his favourite bar. It's almost a relief when a fresh case walks through the door. Almost.

A missing dog, an unrequited debt and a sudden kidnapping all come to a head in a dingy motel out of town.

Private Dick: Lipstick & Lies is the first part of an anthology of loosely-connected erotic stories. Inspired by modern neo-noir greats like Sin City and Max Payne, as well as genre classics like The Maltese Falcon, Double Indemnity, and The Third Man.

Features

  • Diverse cast of compelling, unpredictable femme fatales
  • Lovingly illustrated, interactive sex scenes
  • Dialogue so sharp you can cut yourself
  • Fully voiced audio track
  • Open world exploration
  • Original soundtrack
  • In-depth social network

Sexual Content


Private Dick takes a mature, sophisticated and balanced approach to the depiction of women and sexuality. At the same time, it strives to be creative, exciting and innovative in its sex scenes.

All characters are over the age of 18, all sex acts are fully consensual, and players can opt out of any scene.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features explicit depictions of sexual acts between  consenting adults.
